name: Mech Armada Overdrive
description:
Put your piloting skills to the test as you navigate through 3 fast-paced levels, mowing down enemies and jumping into your mech for repairs if it shuts off after sustaining too much damage!

Controls:

WASD - Move

Space - Fire/Navigate through cutscenes

Left Shift - Parry projectiles & drones

Made for the Nokia 3310 Game Jam with the theme of "On/Off". Hope you guys enjoy!

Programmers

Julien Collins     Noah Dewald     Fred LePage     Andrew Evans
